narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Lexington Health INC is a General Acute Care Hospital provider based in West Columbia, SC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $27.4M in Medicaid payments across 1.4M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $27.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
